software_application.name: BusyBob Student Productivity Platform
software_application.description: Comprehensive student productivity platform integrating task management, mood tracking, academic platforms (Canvas, StudentVue), AI assistance, and focus music through Spotify.

review.reviewBody: BusyBob transformed my college productivity! The Canvas integration saves me hours, and the mood tracking helps me understand my study patterns.

featureList: Smart Task Management with Priority Levels
software_application.requirements: Modern web browser, Internet connection for integrations

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! BusyBob is completely free for students. We believe every student deserves access to powerful productivity tools to succeed academically.

mainEntity.name: Does BusyBob integrate with Canvas and StudentVue?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely! BusyBob seamlessly integrates with both Canvas LMS and StudentVue, allowing you to view grades, assignments, and schedules all in one unified dashboard.

mainEntity.name: How does the Spotify integration work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Connect your Spotify account to get mood-based playlist recommendations, focus session music, and productivity-enhancing study soundtracks. The AI learns your preferences over time.

mainEntity.name: Is my student data secure and private?

acceptedAnswer.text: Student privacy is our top priority. We use enterprise-grade encryption, comply with FERPA and COPPA regulations, and never sell your data. You control what information is shared and can delete your account anytime.

mainEntity.name: Can parents monitor their child's account?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! BusyBob offers Kid Mode with enhanced parental controls for users under 13, allowing parents to monitor and control their child's account while maintaining educational benefits.

how_to.name: How to Set Up BusyBob for Maximum Student Productivity
how_to.description: Complete guide to setting up BusyBob productivity platform with Canvas, StudentVue, and Spotify integrations for optimal student success.

step.name: Create Your Account
step.text: Sign up for free at busybob.site using your email address

step.name: Connect Academic Platforms
step.text: Link your Canvas LMS and/or StudentVue accounts in Settings for automatic grade and assignment sync

step.name: Set Up Task Management
step.text: Create your first tasks with due dates, priorities, and stress levels to start organizing your academic life

step.name: Enable Mood Tracking
step.text: Start logging daily moods to understand patterns and improve your academic wellness
